input.rewritten_query: 查询课程“数据库原理”在各班的平均分、最高分、最低分。

output.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT class.class_name, score.score_value FROM course JOIN course_class ON course.id = course_class.course_id JOIN score ON course_class.id = score.course_class_id JOIN class ON course_class.class_id = class.id WHERE course.course_name = '数据库原理' AND course.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 AND score.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.class_name, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score, MAX(base.score_value) AS max_score, MIN(base.score_value) AS min_score FROM base GROUP BY base.class_name ORDER BY base.class_name

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“课程名称，课程实体映射主字段”及别名提示“课程名、课程名称、course_name”映射
